column1: '''Long live the Halflings! Praise them with great praise!''' is a chorus of praises and thanks to [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] for their valiant efforts in the destruction of the [[One Ring]]
column2: cried out by the Men of [[Gondor]] in many voices and many tongues. It appears in the chapter "[[The Field of Cormallen]]".

column1: 'Long live the Halflings! Praise them with great praise!
Cuio i Pheriain anann! Aglar'ni Pheriannath!
* [[Poems in The Lord of the Rings]]
